== Keezhariyur (CT) (627394) ==

Keezhariyur (CT) is a town in the [[Quilandy]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 13.69 sq. km. and harbouring 3670 households with total population of 15116 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 45 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 449 km. Male population is 7061 and female population is 8055. Scheduled Caste population is 1372 and Scheduled Tribes population is 21. Census Location Code of the town is 627394<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 45 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 45 km. Railway station is at Quilandy at a distance of 13 km.
